Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' is followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in variants that eventually lead to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of process variants containing 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that do not contain 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in successful end-to-end variants ending with 'Payment Handled' without any rejection by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' executions that are part of a rework loop involving a prior 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Ratio of variants where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' is directly followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' versus those followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that occur in cases with total amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' is followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' and then 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', compared to those followed directly by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that are not followed by any further approval step (i.e., directly lead to 'Request Payment'), indicating bypass of PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in variants that include the sequence 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' → 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' → resubmission
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' instances that belong to the top three most frequent process variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs before any rejection activity (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER')
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' per year (2017 vs 2018) to assess temporal trends related to rejections by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities

Name: Number of variants starting with 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' → 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that avoid any rejection activity entirely
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurrences out of all approval activities (including 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER')
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER']"}"
